name: camelConnector
description: Sample Connector developed with camel connector starter library

bf1deed5-2e01-4c63-b149-2c2ffa17f9e5.name: INVOKE
bf1deed5-2e01-4c63-b149-2c2ffa17f9e5.description: Invokes a Camel route from an APS task

inputs.name: camelPayload
inputs.description: Camel message to be processed by the Exchange

inputs.name: camelRouteId
inputs.description: Camel route that will be invoked.

outputs.name: camelResult
outputs.description: Camel message that is produced by the invoked Camel route

outputs.name: camelError
outputs.description: Error description when the Camel route invocation fails
